north_star: To provide a reliable, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure that empowers development teams to deliver high-quality software efficiently.
mission: To design, build, and maintain the foundational cloud infrastructure and core services that support and accelerate software development across the organization.
vision: To create a seamless and resilient cloud environment that enables innovation, reduces operational complexity, and ensures robust performance and security.

core.description: Individuals or teams directly utilizing the cloud infrastructure and core services.
core.value: Product Engineering Teams, Backend Development Teams, DevX Team

supportive.description: Individuals or teams that influence or support the CloudFoundation team's initiatives.
supportive.value: Platform Engineering Team, InfoSec Team, Delivery Team

peripheral.description: External or less directly involved stakeholders who have an interest in the CloudFoundation team's outcomes.
peripheral.value: Operations Team, FinOps Team, Business Leadership

kpis.objective: Ensure high availability of cloud services.
kpis.justification: High availability is critical to maintain productivity and prevent disruptions.
kpis.measurement: Percentage of uptime and number of service interruptions.
kpis.outbound: Monthly availability reports to Engineering and Operations Teams

kpis.objective: Optimize cloud resource utilization and cost.
kpis.justification: Efficient resource utilization reduces costs and improves performance.
kpis.measurement: Cloud cost metrics and resource usage analytics.
kpis.inbound: Cloud usage reports, cost analysis tools
kpis.outbound: Quarterly cost optimization reports to FinOps and Engineering Leadership

kpis.objective: Enhance security and compliance of cloud infrastructure.
kpis.justification: Robust security practices protect data and ensure regulatory compliance.
kpis.measurement: Number of security incidents and compliance audit results.
kpis.outbound: Monthly security and compliance reports to InfoSec and Business Leadership

kpis.objective: Improve developer experience with cloud infrastructure.
kpis.justification: A positive developer experience leads to higher productivity and satisfaction.
kpis.measurement: Developer satisfaction scores from internal surveys and feedback.
kpis.outbound: Quarterly satisfaction reports to Product and Engineering Teams

kpis.objective: Reduce time to provision and configure cloud resources.
kpis.justification: Faster provisioning accelerates development and deployment cycles.
kpis.measurement: Average time taken to provision and configure new cloud resources.
kpis.outbound: Bi-monthly provisioning reports to Development Teams
